item.title: 英迈表示在某些内部系统中发现了勒索软件
item.description: 英迈（Ingram Micro）周六表示，最近在其某些内部系统中发现了勒索软件。【原文：Ingram Micro said on Saturday it recently identified ransomware on certain of its internal systems.】

item.title: 贸易组织称，如果美国继续征收 50%的关税，加拿大可能在经济上支持铝生产商
item.description: 一个重要的行业贸易组织的首席执行官周六表示，加拿大已经讨论过，如果华盛顿对进口金属征收50%的关税在中期内持续下去，加拿大将向力拓等受美国主导的贸易战影响的大型铝生产商提供财政支持。【原文：Canada has discussed offering financial support to large aluminum producers like Rio Tinto impacted by a U.S.-led trade war, in the event that Washington's 50% tariff on imports of the metal persist in the medium term, the CEO of a key industry trade group said on Saturday.】

item.title: 日本政府称，日本关税谈判代表与卢特尼克举行了 "深入 "会谈
item.description: 日本政府表示，日本关税谈判代表赤泽亮世于周四和周六通过电话与美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）进行了 "深入交流"。【原文：Japan's tariff negotiator Ryosei Akazawa held "in-depth exchanges" over the phone with U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick on Thursday and Saturday, the Japanese government said.】

item.title: 中国对电动汽车的激烈竞争考验着泰国的本地生产目标
item.description: 中国电动汽车行业的激烈竞争正蔓延到其在亚洲最大的市场--泰国，因为小型企业正竭力与占主导地位的比亚迪竞争，使雄心勃勃的本地生产计划面临风险。【原文：Hyper-competition in China's electric vehicle sector is spilling over to its biggest market in Asia, Thailand, as smaller players struggle to compete with dominant BYD , putting ambitious local production plans at risk.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，英国章鱼能源公司考虑以 140 亿美元分拆技术部门 Kraken
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）周六援引熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道，英国章鱼能源公司（Octopus Energy）即将聘请银行家监督其技术部门克拉肯技术公司（Kraken Technologies）100 亿英镑（136.5 亿美元）的分拆和股权出售。【原文：Britain's Octopus Energy is close to hiring bankers to oversee a 10 billion pounds ($13.65 billion) separation and stake sale of its technology arm Kraken Technologies, Sky News reported on Saturday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富士康第二季度营收同比增长 15.82
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子生产商、苹果公司最大的 iPhone 组装商台湾富士康周六公布的第二季度财报显示，该公司第二季度营收同比增长 15.82%，创下历史新高。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, on Saturday reported second quarter revenue rose 15.82% from the same period last year to a record for the quarter.】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+考虑在 8 月份将石油产量提高 55 万桶/日
item.description: 两位熟悉讨论情况的消息人士称，欧佩克+将在周六的会议上考虑将8月份的石油产量提高约55万桶/日，高于其批准的5月、6月和7月41.1万桶/日的月度增幅。【原文：OPEC+ will consider raising oil output by around 550,000 barrels per day in August at its meeting on Saturday, up from the monthly increases of 411,000 bpd it approved for May, June and July, two sources familiar with the discussions said.】

item.title: 特朗普称已签署致 12 个国家的关税信函，将于周一发出
item.description: 特朗普拒绝透露所涉国家的名称，表示将在周一公布。【原文：Trump declined to name the countries involved, saying that would be made public on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将于本周就 TikTok 协议与中国展开谈判
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，他将于周一或周二开始与中国就可能达成的嘀嗒协议进行会谈。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday he will start talking to China on Monday or Tuesday about a possible TikTok deal.】

item.title: 墨西哥将 CIBanco 和 Intercam 信托业务暂时移交给开发银行
item.description: 墨西哥财政部周五表示，墨西哥将暂时移交因涉嫌参与洗钱而被美国制裁的两家金融机构的信托处理业务。【原文：Mexico will temporarily transfer the trust-handling businesses of two financial institutions sanctioned by the U.S. for alleged involvement in money laundering, the finance ministry said on Friday.】

item.title: 专家称，重建全球咖啡库存可能至少需要两季好收成
item.description: 咖啡行业官员周五在巴西举行的咖啡晚宴和峰会上表示，在供需平衡连续出现赤字之后，全球咖啡库存的重建可能至少需要几个丰收年。【原文：Rebuilding global coffee stocks may take at least a couple of good crops following successive deficits in the supply-demand balance, coffee industry officials said on Friday during a Coffee Dinner & Summit event in Brazil.】

item.title: 法国与欧洲一道推动在火车上安装卫星互联网
item.description: 法国国有铁路公司 SNCF 不久将启动招标，为其列车增加卫星互联网，成为最新一家探索车载连接天基系统的欧洲铁路运营商。【原文：France's state-owned rail company SNCF will launch a tender soon to add satellite internet to its trains, becoming the latest European rail operator to explore space-based systems for onboard connectivity.】

item.title: 意大利银行为贷款人选择 4 个系统性风险国家，包括俄罗斯
item.description: 意大利央行周五表示，根据旨在控制系统性风险的规定，它已选择美国、英国、瑞士和俄罗斯作为其银行在欧盟以外有大量风险敞口的国家。【原文：The Bank of Italy said on Friday it had selected the United States, Great Britain, Switzerland and Russia as countries outside the European Union that its banks have significant exposure to, under rules designed to govern systemic risks.】

item.title: 消息人士称，距离特朗普的最后期限还有几天，欧洲仍无法达成美国贸易协议
item.description: 五位了解会谈情况的欧盟外交官周五表示，欧盟谈判代表迄今未能在与特朗普政府的贸易谈判中取得突破，现在可能会寻求延长现状，以避免关税上调。【原文：European Union negotiators have failed so far to achieve a breakthrough in trade negotiations with the Trump administration and may now seek to extend the status quo to avoid tariff hikes, five EU diplomats briefed on the talks said on Friday.】

item.title: 研究发现荷兰学校禁用智能手机提高了学生的注意力
item.description: 荷兰政府委托进行的一项研究发现，荷兰学校禁止使用手机和其他电子设备的禁令提高了学生的注意力。【原文：A ban on mobile phones and other electronic devices in Dutch schools has improved focus among students, a study commissioned by the Dutch government found.】

item.title: 关税、地缘政治拖累欧洲首次公开募股，资金仍在流入
item.description: 顾问们告诉路透社，关税和中东动荡令欧洲公司和正在权衡其首次公开募股的投资者感到恐慌，即使波动性减弱，资金重新流入股市。【原文：Tariffs and Middle East turmoil are spooking European companies and the investors weighing their initial public offerings even as volatility subsides and money flows back into equity markets, advisers told Reuters.】

item.title: 意大利议员要求政府就间谍软件丑闻做出答复
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周五透露，意大利立法者已正式询问政府是否对记者进行了间谍活动，可能使用了美国间谍软件制造商 Paragon 提供的技术。【原文：Italian lawmakers have formally asked the government whether it spied on journalists, possibly using technology supplied by U.S.-based spyware maker Paragon, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国股票基金创八个月来最大单周流入量
item.description: 截至7月2日的一周里，美国股票基金吸引了大量资金流入，因为美国股市在人工智能乐观情绪的推动下屡创新高，尽管美国对等关税的90天暂停期即将于7月9日到期，但贸易谈判进展甚微。【原文：U.S. equity funds attracted strong inflows in the week to July 2, as U.S. stocks hit record highs on AI optimism, even as a 90-day pause on U.S. reciprocal tariffs is nearing its July 9 expiry with little progress in trade talks.】

item.title: 全球股票基金吸引八个月来最大单周流入量
item.description: 截至 7 月 2 日的一周内，全球股票基金吸引了大量资金流入，美股创下历史新高，投资者一扫贸易紧张局势的阴霾，追逐与人工智能相关行业的涨幅。【原文：Global equity funds attracted strong inflows in the week to July 2, as U.S. stocks hit record highs, with investors brushing off trade tensions and chasing gains in AI-linked sectors.】

item.title: 独家报道俄罗斯 VTB 首席财务官称，如果利率下调，VTB 将获得数十亿卢布收益
item.description: 俄罗斯 VTB 银行首席财务官德米特里-皮亚诺夫（Dmitry Pyanov）告诉路透社，央行利率每下调 1%，该银行的净利润就会增加 200 亿卢布（约合 2.5 亿美元）。【原文：Every 1% cut in central bank interest rates gives Russia's VTB Bank an extra 20 billion roubles ($250 million) in net profit, CFO Dmitry Pyanov told Reuters, which benefits the government as the state-owned lender plans to distribute 50% of its profits via dividends - half of it to the state.】

item.title: 独家报道：谷歌人工智能概述遭欧盟独立出版商反垄断投诉
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份文件显示，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌遭到了欧盟的反垄断投诉，一群独立出版商投诉谷歌的人工智能概述（AI Overviews）。【原文：Alphabet's Google has been hit by an EU antitrust complaint over its AI Overviews from a group of independent publishers, which has also asked for an interim measure to prevent allegedly irreparable harm to them, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 市场的 90 天关税暂停过山车接近不确定的终点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为主要贸易伙伴设定的与华盛顿达成协议或面临巨额关税的最后期限将于下周到期。【原文：The deadline U.S. President Donald Trump set for major trading partners to strike deals with Washington or face hefty tariffs expires next week, bringing to a close 90 days of volatility but leaving global investors in the dark over what will happen next.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会称，人工智能规则将继续实施，不会暂停
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，欧盟具有里程碑意义的人工智能规则将按照立法者和欧盟国家商定的时间表实施，驳回了一些公司和几个欧盟国家要求暂时中止的建议和压力。【原文：The European Union's landmark rules on artificial intelligence will be implemented according to the timeline agreed by legislators and EU countries, the European Commission said on Friday, dismissing suggestions and pressure from some companies and several EU countries for a temporary pause.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美股反弹，投资者关注关税最后期限
item.description: 投资者将密切关注下周华盛顿的关税新闻，因为惩罚性进口关税的临时暂停即将到期。如果周三的最后期限过去，而贸易紧张局势没有加剧，则可能对市场产生积极影响。【原文：Investors will be keeping a close eye on tariff headlines out of Washington next week, as a temporary suspension of punitive import levies is set to expire. If that Wednesday deadline passes without an increase in trade tensions, it could prove positive for the markets.】

item.title: 路易威登韩国公司称系统漏洞导致客户数据泄露
item.description: 奢侈品牌路易威登韩国分公司周五表示，路易威登韩国分公司6月份发生的系统漏洞事件导致包括联系信息在内的部分客户数据泄露，但不涉及客户的财务信息。【原文：A systems breach at Louis Vuitton Korea in June led to the leak of some of customer data including contact information, but did not involve customers' financial information, the luxury brand's South Korea unit said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称沙特阿美考虑出售电力资产以筹集数十亿美元资金
item.description: 三位知情人士告诉路透社，沙特石油巨头阿美石油公司（Aramco）正在寻求出售多达五家燃气发电厂，这是该公司为腾出可产生数百亿美元的资金而做出的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：Saudi oil giant Aramco is looking to sell up to five gas-fired power plants, three sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters, part of a broader effort to free up funds that could generate tens of billions of dollars.】

item.title: 包括苹果在内的外国手机制造商 5 月在华销量下降 9.7
item.description: 一家政府下属研究公司周五公布的数据显示，包括苹果公司在内的外国品牌手机 5 月份在中国的销量同比下降了 9.7%。【原文：Sales of foreign-branded mobile phones in China, including those of Apple Inc , fell 9.7% year-on-year in May, according to data released by a government-affiliated research company on Friday.】

item.title: 印尼在关税谈判中提出购买美国飞机和小麦
item.description: 印尼首席经济部长告诉路透社记者，印尼将在与美国的关税谈判中主动提出增加印尼国家航空公司印尼鹰航空公司（Garuda Indonesia）的飞机采购量和方便面巨头印多食品公司（Indofood）的小麦采购量。【原文：Indonesia will offer to step up purchases of aircraft by state carrier Garuda Indonesia and wheat by instant noodle giant Indofood , in tariff talks with the United States, its chief economics minister told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国在确认贸易共识的同时，把握美国微妙的休战政策
item.description: 中国商务部周五表示，北京和华盛顿已加紧努力落实双方在近期贸易谈判中达成的共识，但同时提醒美国不要破坏双方 "来之不易 "的共识。【原文：The Chinese commerce ministry said on Friday that Beijing and Washington had stepped up efforts to implement what they had agreed during recent trade talks but cautioned the U.S. against destabilising their "hard-won" consensus.】

item.title: 美国关税最后期限临近，欧洲股市走低
item.description: 随着 7 月 9 日最后期限的快速临近，投资者权衡了美国贸易协议的不确定性，欧洲股市周五走低。【原文：European shares edged lower on Friday, as investors weighed uncertainty over U.S. trade deals, with the July 9 deadline fast approaching.】
